data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 33,752 believers in Udaipur against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Udaipur, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 33,752 believers in the county of Udaipur.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Udaipur, Rajasthan, India. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, help the 33,752 believers in Udaipur to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Brahmin Bhatt people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Brahmin Bhatt people.
Lord, to the people of Udaipur you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Udaipur, Rajasthan, India to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of Udaipur.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

location.name: Udaipur
location.people_groups_list: Bania Nagar, Brahmin Daima, Rabari (Muslim traditions), Brahmin Palliwal, Damor
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bania Nagar (42,000), Brahmin Daima (74,000), Rabari (Muslim traditions) (1,100), Brahmin Palliwal (87,000), Damor (94,000)
